column4: anyone have any clue why would my screen be zoomed in slighly?
i'm missing about 50-100 pixels on all sides
use the monitor buttons and adjust it?
it's an LCD TV so no such buttons
oh the world has changed i guess :)
dont lcd's have some kind of software for calibration?
i tried using xvidtune but it complains of invalid modeline
i think the nvidia settings should help you
that is where the display settings are including modeline i believe
probably something changed in the xorg conf
nothing weird in xorg either.  Looks perfectly normal to me
without gksu it wont save changes to xorg
running with root privileges changes nothing
i mean, did you change any settings
oh yeah, but there are only 2 you can change, resolution and mode
yeah the video mode, tells the monitor how to sync and all that
